title: Berkeley Studio Available Now! S17
posting_body: ['Beautiful Studio- North Shattuck Available now', 'Property Address', '1332 Shattuck Ave.', '| #17 | Berkeley, CA 94709-1479', 'Available: 09/10/2022', 'Offered By', 'Kasa Properties', 'Description', "North Berkeley's historic Shattuck & Vine St. neighborhood is celebrated as the birthplace California cuisine since the 1970’s when Alice Waters opened her Chez Panisse Restaurant, drawn by the original Peet’s Coffee and The Cheese Board Collective Bakery.", 'KEY FEATURES', 'Parking: Off-Street (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', '*photos of similar apartment*', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Large room', 'Bay Windows', 'Hardwood floors', 'Walk In Closet', 'Separate Eat-In Remodeled Kitchen', 'Granite Countertops', 'Tile Flooring in bathroom', 'Blocks from UC Berkeley Campus', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'On-street parking', 'Off-street parking', 'Exercise Room', 'On-Site Laundry', 'Common Rooftop Patio w/ Panoramic Bay Views', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet: $75 added to the base month per pet', 'Water, gas, garbage are flat fees paid IN ADDITION to the base rent.', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', 'Contact info:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally Managed by:', 'Kasa Operations LLC', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,295.00', 'Available: 09/10/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $4,190.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
